name: irq::level::enter

cpu::local::cell::CpuLocalCell::<T>::add.doc:
Adds a value to the per-CPU object in a single instruction.

 This operation wraps on overflow/underflow.

 Note that this memory operation will not be elided or reordered by the
 compiler since it is a black-box.

cpu::local::cell::CpuLocalCell::<T>::sub.doc:
Subtracts a value to the per-CPU object in a single instruction.

 This operation wraps on overflow/underflow.

 Note that this memory operation will not be elided or reordered by the
 compiler since it is a black-box.

doc:
Enters the scope of interrupt handling,
 increasing the interrupt level by one.

 The `cpu_priv_at_irq` argument specifies the CPU privilege level of
 the code interrupted by the IRQ.
